Submodules¶

hamsa.heuristics module¶

This module is used to store all heuristics values as constants.

constant float THRESHOLD_UNIQUE

Threshold used to identify opened questions. If you have more unique answers than the THRESHOLD_UNIQUE probably you have a opened question. The threshold is expressed in percent.

hamsa.survey module¶

hamsa.read_csv(path=None, token=',', encoding='utf8') → hamsa.survey.Survey[source]¶

Reads a CSV file

Parameters

  • path (str) – indicates the file and the path to it

  • token (str) – token used to split the a file along the parsing step. The default is “,” but “;” or “/t” are largely used instead. Opened questions demands diferent tokens since the interviewed could write anything.

  • encoding (str) – assign which encoding must be used along the parsing step. The default is UTF8

Return survey.Survey

The object Survey
